name: df-hst
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(chst, crab(s0, co(chba, cmap, cch), wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), chba)), nat1), wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wss(cv(s1), cfv(cort, cv(s2))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csp, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cva, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))))))
comment: Define the set of complex Hilbert-space-valued states on a Hilbert lattice. Definition of CH-states in [Mayet3] p. 9. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
